h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 5 Secret Area
content: Follow the main path for the chapter up to the Field of Fire, passing by the rolling spiked ball. When you reach the end of the road, a cutscene will begin, and you'll then want to **backtrack where the spiked ball was rolling and find the place where the flames were.**

The content is as follows:
Follow the main path for the chapter up to the Field of Fire, passing by the rolling spiked ball. When you reach the end of the road, a cutscene will begin, and you'll then want to **backtrack where the spiked ball was rolling and find the place where the flames were.**
